Author: Microsoft
Title: Create a web API with ASP.NET Core
Details: This tutorial teaches the basics of building a web API with ASP.NET Core.

Author: Nikolay Kostov
Title: Mathematics for programmers - part 1
Details: A great man has created a great course that all programmers should pass

Author: Microsoft
Title: Data Seeding
Details: Data seeding is the process of populating a database with an initial set of data.

Author: Microsoft
Title: Authentication and authorization for SPAs
Details: The ASP.NET Core 3.1 and later templates offer authentication in Single Page Apps (SPAs) using the support for API authorization. ASP.NET Core Identity for authenticating and storing users is combined with IdentityServer for implementing OpenID Connect.

Author: Kannan Eswar
Title: Build CRUD REST APIs with ASP.NET Core
Details: This tutorial for how to Build CRUD REST APIs with ASP.NET Core 3.1 and Entity Framework Core, Create JWT Tokens, and Secure APIs.

Author: Jason Watmore
Title: React (without Redux) - JWT Authentication Tutorial & Example
Details: In this tutorial we'll go through an example of how you can implement JWT authentication in React (without Redux). I posted another version a while back with redux and thought it would be helpful to post an updated version showing how it can be done without Redux.

Author: Jason Watmore
Title: .NET 5.0 - JWT Authentication Tutorial with Example API
Details: In this tutorial we'll go through a simple example of how to implement custom JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication in a .NET 5.0 API with C#.

Author: Nate Barbettini
Title: ASP.NET Core Token Authentication Guide
Details: The great tutorial for ASP.NET Core Token Authentication Implementation

Author: Nate Barbettini
Title: Newer version of ASP.NET Core Token Authentication Guide
Details: The new version of the great Nate's tutorial for Token Authentication in ASP.NET Core 2.0 - A Complete Guide.
